reviewText:
This how to sell on ebay program was designed and created by an experienced eBay seller and computer technologies instructor.

No computer experience is assumed or necessary but more advanced computer users should not be too bored.

This "ebay class you can watch on TV" features high-definition screen recordings, colorful animated graphics and live video in combination with step-by-step instructions to carefully guide the viewer through two (2) actual eBay auctions.

This program covers auction item research, ebay auction photos, paypal signup, ebay registration, and paypal shipping.
